name: Neon Boom NFT
description:
NFT has evolved very rapidly over the past few months. It expands with every second like the universe, and only the blind can fail to notice it. Right now, with more and more artists seeing blockchain elegantly addressing the origins of digital art, NFTs are exploding all over the internet. Many people say that this bubble will burst soon. But is it really so?

This work visualizes the growth and explosion of the NFT direction. The winner of the auction will also receive a full HD version
